qas.question: Opera was introduced in what year?
What accounted for 1.1% of browser use in April 2011?
Opera focused on which quickly growing market?
Opera is also available on which video game console?
When was the Nintendo Wii introduced?

plausible_answers.text: the fast-growing mobile phone web browser market

qas.question: What market did Nintendo focus on to expand its use?

plausible_answers.text: it has never achieved widespread use

qas.question: How has usage of the Nintendo Wii been shown over time?
How many game consoles has Nintendo sold?
